Posts.Content: I have just finished all my treatments. I have been in treatment since August of 2000. There is no way to know if I am cancer free. I feel like I am now no longer fighting cancer that may remain. How do I just walk away and hope for the best? I feel like I should still be fighting somehow. My doctor said to go home and think happy thoughts. There must be more than that. With locally advanced breast cancer that seems a little naive. Is it?
Posts.Title: after treatment
